title: Order Statistics: Distribution of min, max, kth order statistic
contentHtml:
The distribution of order statistics is a fundamental concept in probability theory.

Given a random sample from a continuous distribution, we can define the kth order statistic as the kth smallest value. This card explores the distribution of min, max, and kth order statistic.
